channel.title: My First Java :D
channel.description:
Well hey everyone. This is my first thing I've made in java. It's a Java Chat Server. I made a little Applet to go with it <3. It's verrryyyy basic, but it took me a while. Readme... [code]MX Chat. My first Java Program, you may edit and redistribute if you will. Some credits would be nice though. My first Java Program, Enjoy. <3 The ChatApplet is a Java Applet, so you need to use an AppletViewer, Or, you could save it and run it in a HTML file. You could try the code I used when testing, MX Chat

Mx Chat, by Yz85Racer

Thanks to 'kupo' from Moparisthebest who made that code for me.[/code] http://www.MegaShare.com/174686 Password is; yamaha. Anyway. Enjoy <3

[/quote]
Why am I not surprised :P[/quote]
I should also give a thanks to you Io9, you did get me into java >.>
